name: Smolder
flavor: Smoke flows from your enemy like tears as their skin begins to blacken and flake.

metadata.flavor: Smoke flows from your enemy like tears as their skin begins to blacken and flake.

effects.name: Effect
effects.effect: Choose the damage type and the weakness for this ability from one of the following: acid, corruption, or fire. The target takes damage before this ability imposes any weakness.

effects.tier1: 3 + R damage; R < WEAK, the target has weakness 5 (save ends)
effects.tier2: 6 + R damage; R < AVERAGE, the target has weakness 5 (save ends)
effects.tier3: 9 + R damage; R < STRONG, the target has weakness equal to 5 + your Reason score (save ends)
